title: Third party software causing game to crash?
body:
Since the 9.2 patch I have been experiencing an issue where my game would crash during game.

The error message that appears states that a third party software may be causing this. I do not play with any other app or software open while playing League, not even the League client. I have never seen this message nor has my game ever crashed before the 9.2 patch so maybe something is related? I have tried using the Hextech Repair Tool to do a clean uninstall and reinstall however it was no use.

[Error message that appears](https://imgur.com/s7Docik)

In detail this is the order of events of what happens:
1. Game runs normally to the 30 minute mark
2. Soon after 30 minutes it will crash, appearing with the error message and windows error sound, forcing me to ALT + F4
3. Game closes and I am given the choice to reconnect via the client that open by itself
4. Soon after reconnecting I get the error but I can't ALT + F4 or close the game in any way

This results in me having to restart my PC completely, which usually by the time I do so, the game has ended with a loss and sometimes a penalty.

Some help would be appreciated otherwise for the time being I will have to quit playing League.

replies.body: There was a configuration issue that caused this some time ago (a couple weeks?) but I was under the impression that had been fixed. I'd recommend submitting a ticket to player support detailing the issue for now: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
I have contacted them and I am currently in the process of getting help. Thank you for the suggestion!
